name: A. O. Smith Corporation
description: A. O. Smith Corporation is a leading manufacturer of water heating and water treatment products, known for its innovation and quality. Founded in 1874, the company has a rich history of providing reliable solutions for residential and commercial customers. A. O. Smith operates in two primary segments: North America and Rest of World. In North America, the company is recognized for its advanced water heaters, offering energy-efficient solutions that meet the growing demand for sustainable products. The company's extensive portfolio includes tankless water heaters, traditional tank water heaters, and hybrid water heaters, all designed to provide optimal performance and efficiency. In international markets, A. O. Smith is expanding its footprint, particularly in China and India, where it offers water purification and heating solutions. The company is committed to sustainability and innovation, continuously developing new technologies to improve energy efficiency and reduce environmental impact. A. O. Smith also emphasizes customer service and support, ensuring that its products meet the highest standards of quality and reliability. With a focus on research and development, A. O. Smith remains at the forefront of the water heating industry, looking to address the evolving needs of consumers worldwide.
